title: Log4j Bringing You Down? Try Infection Monkey?s New Log4Shell Attack Simulation
description: What if you could see how a real cyberattack might unfold in your network? Imagine the insights you would gain into your security posture if you could safely and easily simulate the behavior of malicious actors before they hit your defenses. That?s what the Infection Monkey does.
author: The Infection Monkey team
